d413054f-5749-442f-9c28-9fd017708537.name: 仆从
d413054f-5749-442f-9c28-9fd017708537.notes: IQ 为 0 或者有奴性

f5e9e864-150b-4478-bf4e-9e1b41a157f5.name: 感同身受
f5e9e864-150b-4478-bf4e-9e1b41a157f5.notes: 一方的死亡将直接把另一方的 HP 降为 0

c0c5a31b-02b3-4b2f-a013-a571651524b0.name: 感同身受
c0c5a31b-02b3-4b2f-a013-a571651524b0.notes: 一方的死亡将直接把另一方的 HP 降为 0，但是损伤仅影响盟友不影响你

e940b730-4a66-4109-92fc-6019691405b9.name: 感同身受
e940b730-4a66-4109-92fc-6019691405b9.notes: 一方死亡时另一方也会自动死亡

82cdb4de-71b2-4586-9f35-f043e314e7f3.name: 感同身受
82cdb4de-71b2-4586-9f35-f043e314e7f3.notes: 一方死亡时另一方也会自动死亡，但是损伤仅影响盟友不影响你

aabc4af0-65e9-4a10-949a-ede716ba4da0.name: 影响人群
aabc4af0-65e9-4a10-949a-ede716ba4da0.notes: 几乎所有人，刨去@一大群人@

1a3acce2-0a86-44b7-acd5-e76c8f5eece5.name: 健康
1a3acce2-0a86-44b7-acd5-e76c8f5eece5.notes: +1 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate (but not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

902d5ff7-c22d-458d-bb95-dfd0d4bf0585.name: Fit, Very
902d5ff7-c22d-458d-bb95-dfd0d4bf0585.notes: +2 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate; lose FP at half the normal rate (in both cases, not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

9556f467-36ab-4892-b558-f4856390a7ba.name: 高痛阈
9556f467-36ab-4892-b558-f4856390a7ba.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured; +3 on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning; +3 to resist torture

34ce4485-de1a-42e3-85b5-6b98721d1ee7.name: Luck, Extraordinary
34ce4485-de1a-42e3-85b5-6b98721d1ee7.notes: 每三十分钟游戏可以用一次

b072a1c1-85a4-4905-8246-fa980158399f.name: Off-Hand Weapon Training (@Weapon@)
b072a1c1-85a4-4905-8246-fa980158399f.notes: Replaces equal-named technique on p. B232

5df1730e-c63b-41ab-8545-01d289683e8a.name: 易于命中
5df1730e-c63b-41ab-8545-01d289683e8a.notes: 其他人可以将你的双眼作为攻击目标仅受到 -6 命中减值

4059d0f2-54df-47d0-968f-63a28d33b647.name: 慢速
4059d0f2-54df-47d0-968f-63a28d33b647.notes: 你每 12 小时额外恢复 1 HP

81bd16cb-886f-42fd-b051-a019b150407d.name: 常规
81bd16cb-886f-42fd-b051-a019b150407d.notes: 你每 1 小时额外恢复 1 HP

bf1720dd-ac53-45f8-9d71-301f38e28eb0.name: 快速
bf1720dd-ac53-45f8-9d71-301f38e28eb0.notes: 你每 1 分钟额外恢复 1 HP

cf19262c-810b-4269-92e0-d4b402a21ee7.name: 高速
cf19262c-810b-4269-92e0-d4b402a21ee7.notes: 你每 1 秒额外恢复 1 HP

30b6c6ba-549f-4672-b410-26531017110b.name: 极度
30b6c6ba-549f-4672-b410-26531017110b.notes: 你每 1 秒额外恢复 10 HP

f52f80be-e480-43a6-985a-5eabf66f55ec.name: @罕见：加速度，高原反应，潜水病，晕船，或是太空病等@

6905a693-701a-4491-81ba-fedeab08241b.name: 标志性装备
6905a693-701a-4491-81ba-fedeab08241b.notes: Gear is worth (starting wealth)/10 per level

6e5ffe05-1287-4a88-b358-0f0a379c557c.name: 战斗反射
6e5ffe05-1287-4a88-b358-0f0a379c557c.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

4c9c0fc7-6026-4654-a0b8-7cd2da19919c.name: 幸运
4c9c0fc7-6026-4654-a0b8-7cd2da19919c.notes: 游戏的每个小时可用一次

7edbb1bd-ee3f-4d1b-8f83-00b62e9756bc.name: Delusion (Enough bullets can kill any physical threat)

2707d2b6-8889-405d-9662-094bef8a2a50.name: 期待陪伴
2707d2b6-8889-405d-9662-094bef8a2a50.notes: React to others at +2; -1 to IQ-based skills when alone

874901fe-4e70-423d-aa50-25034985fcab.name: Chummy (Gregarious)
874901fe-4e70-423d-aa50-25034985fcab.notes: React to others at +4; -2 to IQ-based skills when alone, or -1 in a group of 4 or less

686168c5-457e-493b-83ca-d129252e9283.name: 影响人群
686168c5-457e-493b-83ca-d129252e9283.notes: 几乎所有人，刨去@一大群人@

6454d5c8-5c05-4b82-9a7f-87a0813147e5.name: Choose one, or add 12 points to Gun!

b8dbdcbf-77a3-40f6-a908-ea2202ab7b74.name: Choose two
b8dbdcbf-77a3-40f6-a908-ea2202ab7b74.notes: You may add 4 points to Tactics in lieu of one skill

7af262ff-157c-4ab3-9fd3-23b3fee5e9ec.name: Judo
7af262ff-157c-4ab3-9fd3-23b3fee5e9ec.notes: 使得你获得每轮用两只手各招架一次的能力。
